name: 1ddot
author: AFNI Team
description: Computes the correlation matrix of the input 1D files and their inverse correlation matrix.

inputs.description: Remove mean from all vectors (conflicts with '-one').
inputs.name: Dem Flag

inputs.description: Compute with covariance matrix instead of correlation.
inputs.name: Covariance Flag

inputs.description: Compute with inner product matrix instead.
inputs.name: Inner Product Flag

inputs.description: Compute Spearman rank correlation instead (also implies '-terse').
inputs.name: Rank Correlation Flag

inputs.description: Output only the correlation or covariance matrix without any garnish.
inputs.name: Terse Output Flag

inputs.description: Do not quit if a vector is all zeros. The correlation matrix will have 0 where NaNs ought to go.
inputs.name: OK Zero Flag

output-files.description: Output correlation or covariance matrix printed to stdout.
output-files.name: Standard Output
